data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, macOS High Sierra 10.13.3
data.actual_result: Some of the lines disappear, and will switch with other visible lines when switching between 67% and 75% zoom.
data.expected_result: You should see beautifully minimalistic grey lines of separation.
data.short_description: Lines Of Separation In User Settings Disappear At And Below 75% Zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Discord's user settings menu - Zoom out to 75% or less - Observe the small grey separation lines surrounding Discord Nitro and the ChangeLog buttons
